math_keywords: In this exercise, we will perform the addition operation:
Addition is always performed in pairs. At this stage, we are adding:
Each numerical position can only contain digits between 0 and 9. As a result, the excess value (1) was carried over to the next higher position.
Hover over a multiplication on the left to visualize it.
In this exercise, we will perform the subtraction operation:
Subtraction is always performed in pairs. At this stage, we are subtracting:

Neste exercício, o valor superior é maior que o inferior, mas por algumas ordens (unidades, dezenas e centenas) terem valores menores que as ordens inferiores, necessitamos redistribuir os valores e subtrair a partir da reorganização.
